name: The Road from Sumter to Appomattox 2
name_original: The Road from Sumter to Appomattox 2
description:
The Road from Sumter to Appomattox 2 is a strategy game developed by Adanac Command Systems. It was originally released in 1994. Adanac Command Systems published the game.
You can play The Road from Sumter to Appomattox 2 on PC.
